title: Few, A Few, Little, A Little

exercises.title: Few, A Few, Little, A Little

questions.question: I was ………………………… apprehensive about his reaction.
questions.description: A little has a positive meaning.

questions.question: I have ………………………. friends that I can trust.
questions.description: Use few with plural nouns and little with uncountable nouns.

questions.question: They were ……………………… concerned about his health.
questions.description: Few is used with plural nouns.

questions.question: I have ……………………….. interest in politics.
questions.description: Use little with uncountable nouns and few with plural nouns.

questions.question: ……………………….. politicians are really honest.
questions.description: Either few or a few is possible here with slightly different meanings. Few politicians means hardly any politicians a few politicians means a small number of politicians.

questions.question: There are only …………………………. copies left.
questions.description: Write a few after limiting words like only.

questions.question: I would like to ask ………………………… questions.
questions.description: A few means a small number.

questions.question: I have got …………………………. water if you are thirsty.
questions.description: A little indicates a small amount.

questions.question: Only ……………………….. students in this class will pass the test.
I know I have very ……………………….. options.
We have very ………………………. money.
questions.description: Use little after very. Use little with uncountable things like money.
